item.title: Better External Authorization
item.description: I will talk about the better external authorization feature in 1.9 that allows users to easily integrate Istio with external authorization system (e.g. OPA, OAuth2). The better external authorization is the latest improvement that solves a much wanted customer request for better extensibility in the authorization policy.
